properties.areaDesc: Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 29 at 4:05PM AST until March 3 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A northerly swell will invade the Atlantic waters late
Sunday...

.Winds and seas will increase with the arrival of a frontal
boundary and a northerly swell, that will sink southwards and
spread across the Atlantic waters and Mona Passage Sunday through
Monday.

* WHAT...Seas between 6 to 8 feet expected late Sunday night,
increasing 8 to 10 feet on Monday. Northeast winds between 15 to
25 kt with occasionally higher gusts.

* WHERE...Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico and USVI from 10 NM to
19.5N.

* WHEN...From 8 PM Sunday to 2 AM AST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SUNDAY TO 2 AM AST TUESDAY
